results.title: Six degrees of separation [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Maiden Movies, New Regency Pictures, Fred Schepisi and Arnon Milchan
results.brief_description: John Guare adapted his hit Broadway play for the screen version of “Six degrees of separation”. Having won accolades on Broadway, Stockard Channing reprises her role of Ouisa Kittredge in the film, directed by Fred Schepisi. Ouisa and her husband Flan (Donald Sutherland) are New York art dealers, trading at the high end of the market to Upper West Side clientele. One night they allow a young man into their home who has been wounded in a street attack and who is coincidentally a friend of their Harvard enrolled children. Paul (Will Smith), the son of Sidney Poitier, charms and beguiles the Kittredges regaling them with tales of his life. But Paul is not what he claims to be, sending the Kittredges on a journey of discovery as to who Paul is and what role he plays in their lives. Their story is retold in a series of flashbacks - dinner party vignettes that reflects the Kittredges’ social status and professional/personal ambitions. “Six degrees of separation” questions notions of belonging and of family, of trust and prejudice and is a sharp observation of identity and social mores in upper class Manhattan. Also stars Heather Graham, Ian McKellen, Mary Beth Hurt, Anthony Michael Hall and Bruce Davison.

results.title: Six days seven nights
results.creator_credit: Touchstone Pictures, Ivan Reitman, Wallis Nicita and Roger Birnbaum
results.brief_description: The perfect scenario - a remote island vacation with the man you love. He proposes, you say yes, life is wonderful. Then you are called away to do a one-day shoot in Tahiti and suddenly your life changes. High-powered New York magazine editor Robin Monroe (Anne Heche) finds herself in this very situation when the plane, engaged for the one-day shoot and piloted by the rough and ready Quinn Harris (Harrison Ford), is forced to land in stormy weather on an unknown remote island. Robin and Quinn are left to deal with each other, with survival and an uncertain future, whilst Robin’s boyfriend Frank (David Schwimmer) and Quinn’s girlfriend Angelica (Jacqueline Obradors) share their fears and concern at the hotel bar. Filmed on location on the Hawaiian island of Kauai. Cast also includes Allison Janney, Temuera Morrison.

results.title: Six Chevaux Bleus = Six Blue Horses
results.brief_description:
A Chinese man inherit six blue porcelain horses and discovers that one of them contains the combination to a safe filled with diamonds. In order to recover the diamonds which are guarded by an antiquarian, the old man’s nephews must contend with a gang of criminals.

Credits: Producer, Michel Peynet ; director, Philippe Joulia ; writers, Philippe Joulia, Yves Desmoulin ; photography, Jacques Ledoux ; music, Antoine Duhamel.
Cast: Henri Cremieux, Yvonne Clech, Corinne Le Poulain, Patrick Boitet, Pascal Boitet.

results.title: Six Australians. Episodes 4-6
results.creator_credit: John McGowan and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description: Winner of the Human Rights Commission Inaugural Media Award 1984. The series explores the life and times of six Aboriginal Australians: Sylvia Blanco, Maurice Rioli, Neenya Charles (Eps 1-3), Trevor Adamson, Freda Glynn, Cliff Coulthard (Eps 4-6)

results.title: Sitting right
results.brief_description: Opening with a series of incidents in which girls are rebuked for poor posture, the film presents examples of good habits which are juxtaposed against bad ones. The film suggests that women can improve their posture by observing movie stars and other well poised role models. Stresses the importance of maintaining a healthy mental attitude to appearance, by devoting regular time to practicing good posture, until it become effortless and automatic. Shows how to sit down and how to stand up with particular attention to leg, arm and head positions. An essential guide for any women, or man, aspiring to ladylike poise and grace.

results.title: Sitting pretty: how to paint a portrait
results.creator_credit: Randolph Coats and Bell and Howell
results.brief_description: A dynamic and colorful demonstration of painting a portrait by one of America’s most popular portrait artists, Randolph Coats. A model is posed in various different lightings, before the artist decides on the one which suits his purpose best; then the process of painting a portrait is followed step by step to its completion.
